metadata.label: Variable
metadata.description: Assign a value to a variable

codedata.sourceCode: int i = 0;

metadata.label: Variable
metadata.description: Assign a value to a variable

codedata.sourceCode: string finalMsg = "";

metadata.label: While
metadata.description: Loop over a block of code.

metadata.label: get
metadata.description: The `Client.get()` function can be used to send HTTP GET requests to HTTP endpoints.

codedata.sourceCode: json response = check foodClient->get("/food/pineapples");

metadata.label: targetType
metadata.description: HTTP response, `anydata` or stream of HTTP SSE, which is expected to be returned after data binding

codedata.sourceCode: finalMsg += response.toString();

metadata.label: Variable
metadata.description: Assign a value to a variable

codedata.sourceCode: int attempts = 0;

metadata.label: New Connection
metadata.description:
The HTTP client provides the capability for initiating contact with a remote HTTP service. The API it
provides includes the functions for the standard HTTP methods forwarding a received request and sending requests
using custom HTTP verbs.

codedata.sourceCode: http:Client|http:ClientError adminClient = new ("http://localhost:9090");

metadata.label: responseLimits
metadata.description: Configurations associated with inbound response size limits

metadata.label: timeout
metadata.description: The maximum time to wait (in seconds) for a response before closing the connection

metadata.label: socketConfig
metadata.description: Provides settings related to client socket configuration

metadata.label: laxDataBinding
metadata.description:
Enables or disables relaxed data binding on the client side. Disabled by default.
When enabled, the JSON data will be projected to the Ballerina record type and
during the projection, nil values will be considered as optional fields and
absent fields will be considered for nilable types

metadata.label: httpVersion
metadata.description: The HTTP version understood by the client

metadata.label: circuitBreaker
metadata.description: Configurations associated with the behaviour of the Circuit Breaker

metadata.label: compression
metadata.description: Specifies the way of handling compression (`accept-encoding`) header

metadata.label: validation
metadata.description: Enables the inbound payload validation functionalty which provided by the constraint package. Enabled by default

metadata.label: Connection Scope
metadata.description: Scope of the connection, Global or Local

metadata.label: If
metadata.description: Add conditional branch to the integration flow.

metadata.label: Return
metadata.description: Value of '"Error occurred while creating admin client"'

codedata.sourceCode: return "Error occurred while creating admin client";

metadata.label: While
metadata.description: Loop over a block of code.

metadata.label: post
metadata.description: The `Client.post()` function can be used to send HTTP POST requests to HTTP endpoints.

codedata.sourceCode: json response = check adminClient->post("/admin/restart", {body: e.message()});

metadata.label: targetType
metadata.description: HTTP response, `anydata` or stream of HTTP SSE, which is expected to be returned after data binding

metadata.label: message
metadata.description: An HTTP outbound request or any allowed payload

metadata.label: mediaType
metadata.description: The MIME type header of the request entity

metadata.label: Return
metadata.description: Value of '"Response received from admin service: " + response.toString()'

codedata.sourceCode: return "Response received from admin service: " + response.toString();

metadata.label: Return
metadata.description: Value of '"Error occurred while invoking admin service"'

codedata.sourceCode: return "Error occurred while invoking admin service";

metadata.label: Return
metadata.description: Value of '"Error occurred while invoking food service"'

codedata.sourceCode: return "Error occurred while invoking food service";
return finalMsg;
